data: `minecraft:lookat` defines the behavior when another entity looks at this entity.

data.Name: allow_invulnerable
data.Description: If true, invulnerable entities (e.g. Players in creative mode) are considered valid targets.

data.Name: filters
data.Description: Defines the entities that can trigger this component.

data.Name: look_cooldown
data.Description: The range for the random amount of time during which the entity is 'cooling down' and won't get angered or look for a target.

data.Name: look_event
data.Description: The event identifier to run when the entities specified in filters look at this entity.

data.Name: search_radius
data.Description: Maximum distance this entity will look for another entity looking at it.

data.Name: set_target
data.Description: If true, this entity will set the attack target as the entity that looked at it.
